column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The macarons here are my new favorite in town. I was a little turned off by the pricing at $2.25 each
column2: which is a little on the pricey side in comparison to others around town.  As soon as I took my first bite I knew it was worth every penny. The texture
column4: and packaging is perfect.  My personal favorites are pistachio and salted caramel.  The cookies also blew me away with the classic chocolate chip being my favorite.
